title: Canada : Gross Domestic Product ( GDP ) by industry December 2019
yAxis: GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars for 20 number of Industrys.

Industry Real estate and rental and leasing has the highest GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars and Management of companies and enterprises has the lowest GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars.
The GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars of Industry Management of companies and enterprises is 27.33% smaller than the maximum value at Real estate and rental and leasing.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Industry, and GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars in each Industry on the y axis.

Industry Real estate and rental and leasing has the highest GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars and Management of companies and enterprises has the lowest GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars for 20 number of Industrys.

Industry Real estate and rental and leasing has the highest GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars and Management of companies and enterprises has the lowest GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars.
The GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars of Industry Management of companies and enterprises is 27.33% smaller than the maximum value at Real estate and rental and leasing.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Industry in the x axis and GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars in the y axis.
The GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars is highest at Industry Real estate and rental and leasing and lowest at Industry Management of companies and enterprises.
The highest Industry Real estate and rental and leasing has 244991.0 more GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars than the lowest Industry Management of companies and enterprises.

GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars at Industry Real estate and rental and leasing is 254294.0 , second place is  at 254294.0, and thirdly is Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction at 145909.0.
Considered together, the average GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars in all 20 Industrys is roughly 99092.1.
